meanings.definition: The emission of light as a result of a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent1: Chemiluminescence can be seen in glow sticks.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study chemiluminescence to understand how light is produced.
meanings.sent3: The firefly's chemiluminescence made it the star of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like chemiluminescence in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The chemiluminescence of the stars in the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The production of light by a chemical reaction without the emission of heat.
meanings.sent1: Chemiluminescence is used in glow-in-the-dark toys.
meanings.sent2: The glow of the firefly is an example of chemiluminescence.
meanings.sent3: The chemiluminescence of the potion made the wizard's lab look magical.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with chemiluminescence, captivating everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The chemiluminescence of the deep-sea creatures is fascinating to researchers.
